message.body: Julian! Sorry I was SUCH a monster earlier! I was trying to figure out this dumb business account PayPal issue I've been having and so mad! It was very nice to see your smiling face tho.
I was very impressed with your so-called "business call." Def not monster status.
lol it made me think of your meetings. i was totally in a dumb meeting call that lasted from 15th street to just now. UGH
I just saw your last txt. My life is a SEA OF MEETINGS. Save me!
